pr_title: Buffer single-byte writes in MultiFromOutputStream for better performance

timeline.message:
Enhanced implementation of MultiFromOutputStream to buffer bytes when written one at a time to avoid publishing single-byte data chunks. The logic remains the same for byte array writes. Some new tests.

Signed-off-by: Santiago Pericasgeertsen <santiago.pericasgeertsen@oracle.com>
